item.title: About
item.description: Hello! I am Mike Hadlow. I am a software engineer, based in the UK. I’ve been building software professionally for over 20 years. The majority of my career was with Microsoft development tools and technologies and since 2002 primarily with .NET. But for the last 3 years I’ve been working mostly with Node and TypeScript (and a little bit of Elm). During that time I’ve worked on a large range of projects in many different industries, ranging from finance and insurance to the music business. I’ve specialized in large scale software development and focussed particularly on distributed event driven architectures. I’ve worked on diverse platforms including on-premise, Kubernetes, and AWS serverless. My role has varied from software developer to chief software architect along with a small number of non-coding consultancy engagements.
